Topic.Title: Looking for development team for a WIP Game

Posts.EditableText: I myself do not have nearly enough time to dedicate to hashing out my WIP game entitled " A Week In The Life Of: A College Student. If anyone would like to join the game's development team and help me hash out my game, you may e-mail me at dillon.honore@gmail.com or dillon_honore1@vcccd.edu.
